text.section:
The Board shall adopt regulations to carry out the provisions of this section, including regulations that cover:
The qualifications, training, and monitoring of individuals who perform auricular detoxification under the supervision of an acupuncturist licensed by the Board;
The number of individuals performing auricular detoxification to which an acupuncturist licensed by the Board may provide supervision; and
The requirements for the approval of a clinical substance abuse program or a setting where an individual may perform auricular detoxification under the supervision of an acupuncturist licensed by the Board.

section.section: Except as otherwise provided in this section, an individual may not practice, attempt to practice, or offer to practice auricular detoxification in this State.

An acupuncturist who is licensed by the Board is responsible for assuring the Board that the individual performing auricular detoxification under the supervision of the acupuncturist complies with all applicable laws, regulations, and standards of practice.

If the individual performing auricular detoxification under this section violates any applicable laws, regulations, or standards of practice, the Board may discipline:
The individual performing auricular detoxification; and
The supervising acupuncturist licensed by the Board for unprofessional conduct under § 1A-309 of this subtitle.
